= bind =

This directory holds a container for running a '''bind''' server for DNS(-SD) pre-configured for working with the Arrowhead Framework V3.2 core services.

== Instructions ==

=== Running locally ===

Build this container by running the following command from this directory.

<pre>docker build --tag ahf-bind .</pre>
Create a Docker network for other containers to connect to this one. This step is not necessary if you have created the network previously.

<pre>docker network create ahf</pre>
Run the container connected to the <code>ahf</code> network.

<pre>docker run --rm --network ahf --name ahf-bind ahf-bind</pre>
